      • setAlpha

        public void setAlpha(double[] aCenter,
                     double[] aSpan)
        sets the range of parameter values used for Bennets method. Default is a span of 5 centered about 1 (exp(-5) to (exp(5)).
        Parameters:
        aCenter - geometric mean of all values
        aSpan - natural log of ratio of max value to aCenter
